name: findnearbyplaces-api
description: This repo will contain the necessary code to complete the project for ISTA 330. It will be done   in two parts. Part one will contain the necessary code to support the backend-serivces. This   will include inserting and getting app info from a database. Part two will contain the   necessary code for the frontend-services. Together they will make a yelp-like app, which will   be deployed on Heroku. The database will be a Postgres SQL database.
